title: When downloading/syncing, the mail counter is off
content:
When retrieving/syncing mail from my imap account, the counter for incoming mail is always wrong, it says it is retrieving 4 out of 2 or 8 out of 1. Already tried the repair function, but that didn't help. Any ideas?

Thunderbird v. 115.14.0.
creator: bambilla

title: When rebooting my desktop, Meta dropped Thunderbird.  Now I don't have any accessibility.  How do I recapture my previous Thunderbird so as to have all my email back?
content: How do I recapture my previous Thunderbird so as to have all my email back? Thank you. Tim
creator: bpf19

title: Copied Thunderbird Profile from Windows 10 PC, pasted to Windows 11 PC - No email history or address book
content:
Copied Thunderbird Profile from Windows 10 PC, pasted to Windows 11 PC - No email history or address book

I followed the steps to copy the profile from the old PC and paste it into the folder on the old PC.

Thunderbird is using that profile, but there are no email history or address book.
creator: rayhayes

title: Thunderbird -- Scrollbar on the right side of compose pane disappeared about five days ago
content:
Tbird ver 91.13.1 Desktop Win 11 Pro ver 23H2, upgraded from Win 10.

Scrollbar disappeared for no apparent reason about five days ago when composing emails.

I'm also working an older draft and it's still functional, as it is on replies to received messages that have scrollbars.

I have gone to Troubleshooting Mode and restarted, disabled add-ons and restarted, no effect.

I also verified that scrollbars were enabled, to no effect. On second thought, I went into the registry and found that the Dynamic Scrollbars actually DID have an incorrect value of (0). Changing it to (1), closing out, and restarting also had no effect. Are there other scrollbar values that should be adjusted?? I hate that nearly-invisible Windows scrollbar that has to be pulled out when needed. Could that possibly be related, or is there a patch for that?

How do I save all my emails, drafts, and sent messages if it's necessary to delete and reinstall the same version? I have one active yahoo account and one hotmail that's no longer active, but I want to save the contents.

I don't want to upgrade to 102, which comments seem to imply may have undesired changes. It seems that every upgrade requires research to disable unwanted features or glitches.

I need that scrollbar to navigate messages as I revise them, not having it is just Not Acceptable.

Thx in advance, J_
creator: reapinaz

title: J'ai supprimé mon compte andre.gaumont@wanadoo.fr comment le récupérer?

title: Email senden und Empfangen
content:
Hallo, ich kann seit gestern keine Emails mehr bei Thunderbird versenden und auch keine empfangen. Ich habe 3 Email Adressen dort eingerichtet. Bis gestern funktioniert alles. Woran kann das liegen, habe nichts verändert. Hat ein Thunderbird ein Problem auf den Server zu zugreifen?

Über eine Antwort würde ich mich freuen.

Gruß Sylvia
creator: s.bohn

title: Accusé de lecture
content: Comment savoir que mon e-mail a été ouvert ou lu par son destinataire ? Comment inclure un accusé de lecture dans mes messages envoyés ?
